comment:
>>38431061
There's been some subtle nuances, I'd recommend reading it if you had the time.

Brief summary (because I'm too busy to give a full one right now) is that we're playing a virtual MMORPG that runs at an accelerated rate.

It features a special currency called celestial gems that are required for really fancy stuff.

If you die the first time you lose your 'ID' - special item that allows you to access your inventory. You then become a 'nameless' and the game is much more difficult for you. Of note is the fact you're unable to use celestial gems.

Nameless - ID'ers relations are tense because of this, there was a recent uprising incited by the dickbag PvP guild.
name: Anonymous
